mapper.insert: insert into tbl_salaries_change(operate_user_id, operate_user_name, operate_date, user_id, old_salary, current_salary, change_percent, change_date, change_reason) values (#{operateUserId}, #{operateUserName}, #{operateDate}, #{userId}, #{oldSalary}, #{currentSalary}, #{changePercent}, #{changeDate}, #{changeReason})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_salaries_change where user_id=#{userId} order by change_date desc
